trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de methode die verantwoordelijk is voor de **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** gebeurtenis van een <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: De gemachtigde WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler is gedefinieerd voor de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>gebeurtenis van de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: U hebt toegang tot de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>gebeurtenis van de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>klasse door te geven van een subroutine met de naam **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in het bestand Global.asax voor uw ASP.NET-toepassing.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>vormt een <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>object met de Windows-identiteit die is geleverd door IIS en de huidige <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>en doorgegeven aan de **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: U kunt de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>eigenschap van de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>object doorgegeven aan de **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** gebeurtenis om in te stellen de <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>eigenschap van het huidige <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>aan een aangepaste <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>object.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Als u niet een waarde op voor de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>eigenschap tijdens de **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** gebeurtenis, de Windows identity geleverd door IIS wordt gebruikt als de identiteit voor de huidige aanvraag.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Als IIS wordt gebruikt voor anonieme verificatie, wordt de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>eigenschap van de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>object is ingesteld op de identiteit die is geretourneerd door de <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>methode.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: De **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** is alleen de gebeurtenis die optreedt wanneer de verificatie <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>is ingesteld op <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>en de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>is een actieve HTTP-module voor de toepassing.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
